imdb.title: Buru Jenda
imdb.plot: Yuji Kaido was diagnosed with a serious disease and since there was no cure for the unknown illness, he was cryogenically frozen. Twenty years later, he wakes up to see the Earth like it has never been before-the humanity is almos...

episodes.title: One Day
episodes.plot: Humankind has been replaced as the dominant species on Earth by a race of monstrous insect-like creatures known as the Blue. Sleeper Yuji Kaido finds himself thrust into this nightmarish world, suddenly awakened after 22 years in suspended animation.

episodes.title: Cry
episodes.plot: Yuji learns the horrible truth about the Blue. Marlene and the Sleeper Recovery Team have been given orders to get Yuji to space station Second Earth alive.

episodes.title: Trial
episodes.plot: Yuji pleads to be trained as part of the team. Armed with new skills and a newfound confidence in his ability to survive, Yuji is ready for action.

episodes.title: Agony
episodes.plot: Yuji disobeys Marlene's orders by saving a little girl's life, and discovers a group of survivors hidden among the ruins of the city. Yuji makes a promise to the little girl, Yung, that he will protect her from the Blue.

episodes.title: Priority
episodes.plot: The surviving members of the Sleeper Recovery Team must enter an abandoned communications tower that is now a Blue nest in a desperate attempt to contact Second Earth.

episodes.title: Relation
episodes.plot: Marlene and Yuji now travel on foot towards Baikonur Space Base. The tensions between the two come to a head, as Yuji confronts the demons that now haunt him in this nightmarish new world.

episodes.title: Oasis
episodes.plot: Yuji is separated from Marlene and Dice amidst the confusion of a sandstorm. He is rescued from the desert by a band of nomads, and is befriended by Elena, a young nomad girl.

episodes.title: Confirm
episodes.plot: Marlene and Dice are reunited with Yuji outside the nomad camp. Marlene presses Yuji to continue the journey to Second Earth, but Yuji refuses.

episodes.title: Tactics
episodes.plot: Marlene and Yuji arrive at Baikonur, only to find the space base in a state of chaos. The facility is crawling with Blue, and the computer defense systems have turned on their human counterparts.

episodes.title: Go Mad
episodes.plot: The lives of the remaining recovery squad members are thrown into jeopardy when a renegade officer attempts to hijack the shuttle and escape on his own.

episodes.title: Progress
episodes.plot: Yuji is rushed to intensive care after being attacked by a Blue aboard the shuttle to Second Earth. Now, Marlene must face an inquiry before the High Council and defend her recent actions on the planet's surface.

episodes.title: Heresy
episodes.plot: When Yuji disappears from the Medical Station, Marlene defies orders and decides to find him on her own.

episodes.title: Set
episodes.plot: Marlene's attempts to free Yuji from the laboratory in which he is being held are thwarted. Now she must once again stand before the High Council to defend her actions, this time with Yuji at her side.

episodes.title: Calm
episodes.plot: After beginning an intensive combat training program with the newly formed Sleeper Brigade, Yuji finds himself the object of another young Sleeper's attention.

episodes.title: A Sign
episodes.plot: A large attack force is sent to Earth, the first wave in a new campaign to reclaim the planet from the Blue. Yuji is awed when a fellow Sleeper, Tony, wipes out an entire Blue nest on his own.

episodes.title: Eclosion
episodes.plot: Marlene notices that Yuji's behavior is getting stranger and stranger. On the battlefield he is a force to be reckoned with, but he has an unhealthy obsession with destroying the Blue.

episodes.title: Chaos
episodes.plot: Director Miyagi reveals to Marlene the true cause of Yuji's accelerated rate of achievement - an infestation of "B cells" that have begun to eat away at his mind.

episodes.title: Collapse
episodes.plot: The Sleeper Brigades launch yet another offensive against the Blue, and Yuji's lust for battle grows out of control as his B cells begin to take hold of his sanity.

episodes.title: Versus
episodes.plot: The second airborne operation meets with disaster when the Blue counterattack outnumbers Second Earth forces five-to-one.

episodes.title: Joker
episodes.plot: While Marlene flies a distraught Yuji back to Second Earth, Tony uses his Sleeper skills to infiltrate the High Council.

episodes.title: Dogma
episodes.plot: Yuji and Marlene infiltrate the Blue infested Medical Station and are soon reunited with Rick and Soo.

episodes.title: Soliste
episodes.plot: With Rick injured too severely to continue, Marlene and Yuji continue through the Medical Station alone.

episodes.title: Compass
episodes.plot: The remaining survivors aboard Second Earth begin to rebuild after Tony's devastating attack. Director Miyagi lays out his plan to make Second Earth the permanent home of the human race.

episodes.title: Adagio
episodes.plot: Satellite images of the Earth reveal a mass Blue migration in South America, and Yuji volunteers to investigate.

episodes.title: Let Me
episodes.plot: A monstrous Blue has emerged in the heart of the South American nest, the only thing standing between Yuji and the answers he so desperately seeks.
